controller
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatabaseSearch
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseSearch

Main interface for the jTunes System. All methods called from the JSP's reside here

Author:
Benjamin Petersen, Shaun Brockhoff, Justin Nelson

removeSong

public java.lang.String removeSong(java.lang.String fileName,
                                   java.lang.String owner)
Utilizes the actual.RemoveSong class to remove a mp3 file from the system including the database

Parameters:
fileName - The name of the mp3 file to remove
owner - The username of the owner of the mp3
Returns:
A String indicating the success or failure of the removal

createUser

public java.lang.String createUser(java.lang.String username,
                                   java.lang.String password1,
                                   java.lang.String password2)
Utilizes the actual.Login class to create a new user

Parameters:
username - The desired username
password1 - The desired password
password2 - The desired password again for verification
Returns:
String indicating the success or failure in creating the new user

deleteUser

public java.lang.String deleteUser(java.lang.String userToDelete,
                                   java.lang.String currentUser)
Utilizes the databaseAccess.QuerySB class to delete a user from the system. Only an admin can delete a user and a user can not delete his/her own account

Parameters:
userToDelete - The user to delete
currentUser - The current user of the system
Returns:
A String indicating the success or failure of the deletion

login

public boolean login(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password)
Utilizes the actual.Login class to log a user into the system

Parameters:
username - The username of the user
password - The password of the user
Returns:
A String indicating the success or failure of the login
